html:
5.1.18  12:02 am   did you know that

     still don't





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

4.30.18  11:36 pm   What was the cheat code for happiness again? Kinda forgot it when i was born...

     any code you can imagine

4.30.18  11:27 pm   do you think there is an afterlife?

     yes, and before

4.30.18  11:19 pm   What did you use before YouTube? 

     billwurtz dot com. still do

4.30.18  11:19 pm   In itunes, why is your music classified as Pop?

     i wonder why it has to be classified at all

4.30.18  9:56 pm   How to do things, Bill?

     it's more fun if you don't know

4.30.18  9:43 pm   why do you answer the same questions multiple times

     because every question has already been asked multiple times

4.30.18  9:30 pm   What is your favorite periodic element?

     hydrogen

4.30.18  9:29 pm   Why do forks typically have four prongs? What do you think would be a better number?

     i think 4 seems about right

4.30.18  8:51 pm   Why are you different?

     why is everyone else different

4.30.18  8:37 pm   how do you get your vocals to fit so well in the mix? the vocals in my music either overpowers all other instruments, or is smashed by the bass. your vocals fit perfectly, what's your secret? huh bill??

     meticulous manual micro management of the volume, at every moment. i've desperately tried to find an automatic solution but doing it manually is just the only way to get the results i need. oh and also i do the same thing with the eq

4.30.18  8:36 pm   Do you think world peace is possible?

     hopefully something a little more interesting

      I mean why not? The average guy is pretty okay!

     hopefully better

4.30.18  8:11 pm   it's weird, on here lots of people asking if you're depressed but on youtube everyone's commenting about how happy the song is.​

     i will be holding a contest to figure out whether i am happy or sad. no hints except that i'm not sad

4.30.18  8:07 pm   is the intermission from the history of the entire world the history of japan video?

     no

4.30.18  7:53 pm   Why is your song "In California" so darn catchy?

     i am a fisherman (fisher person)

4.30.18  7:53 pm   are you a fan of the key command Cmd + or Cmd - to zoom in and out.

     yes

      those are definitely my favorite commands

4.30.18  7:51 pm   How do you avoid getting sued for your music sounding too similar for someone else's?

     if there is a conflict, it might be best to just give them a credit and share the points. or another interesting strategy is if you can find another song that is earlier than both yours and theirs, which also has the element in question

4.30.18  7:39 pm   I'm wonder, I've seemed to notice that later videos and music videos have something to do with depression. Are you dealing with it?

     some people think my content has gotten happier. some people think it has gotten sadder. i will be holding a contest to figure out which. stay tuned

4.30.18  7:06 pm   i bet you think of yourself as a real special cog like coated in chromatic metal while the rest are dull grey and youre a square cog while the rest are round because you're edgy and you write weird music thats uniquely artistic in a world desolate of creativity and you refuse to capitalize or use basic color theory because you dont follow the system and while the other cogs turn clockwise youll be turning counterclockwise because you dont roll with the time and one word answers pff thats your cup of tea but probably theres no tea in the cup because thats too cliche you put lemonade in it but lemme tell you something kid it may be so but in the end we are all cogs coughing and puffing until we fall out of the machine due to exhaustion. Right?

     you'd think there would be a solar powered machine by now

4.30.18  6:58 pm   give me inspirational advice

     i am trying

4.30.18  6:48 pm   Somebody: "Wow you're such a great artist"
Me: "oh wow thank you"
Somebody: "you should really go to school for art-"
My thoughts: "IVE HEARD THIS SHIT SO MANY TIMES WHY DO PEOPLE THINK GOING TO SCHOOL FOR ART IS A GOOD IDEA ITS FUCKING IDIOTIC HOLY SHIT THIS MAKES ME SO ANGRY IF IVE GOTTEN THIS FAR WITHOUT SCHOOL WHY THE FUCK DO YOU THINK SCHOOL IS A GOOD IDEA FUCK YOU"
Me: oh I don't want to go to school for art
*person looks at me in confusion and disgust*

Dude this has happened to me so many times and it makes me extremely angry that people think one has to go to school for art to be a good artist. In fact I'd like to argue that it diminishes creativity and tortures the soul. At least, that's what school In general has done to me. Sorry for the vent. I'm normally not this crazy (I think) but it's one of the few things in this world that really gets to me- that people think school is such a requirement- workin �g for so �meone else just to get a good grade. It's fucking retarded. 

     try saying 'i prefer to make art outside of school - it's more fun, and i think there's more possibilities, less restrictions, which in turn makes the art stronger.'

4.30.18  6:33 pm   do you ever get tired of people asking about capital letters or the shift and caps lock keys?

     no, i consider myself an expert on capitalization. it is nice to be able to lend some expertise

4.30.18  6:26 pm   how come the notebook is on the home page of your website when you don't seem to use it much?

     there are hundreds of pages of writing there, and many more to be added

4.30.18  5:27 pm   why do your videos take so long to make dude?

     how long do yours take

4.30.18  5:15 pm   how do I be happy after a break up?

     get to know yourself again, especially your former lover's least favorite parts about you

4.30.18  5:08 pm   do i need to know "music theory" if i want to make some songs

     other way around

4.30.18  5:03 pm   Why does the top of the page have the word questions spelled as ueqstions and the letter q green.

     graphics free title graphics

4.30.18  4:55 pm   How do you rotate text on MS paint?

     i have no idea

4.30.18  4:20 pm   Can you say something funny?

     nothing is funny

4.30.18  4:18 pm   What are your thoughts on early music, as in music written before 1650 or so?

     i don't have access to most of it

4.30.18  3:56 pm   when you ask about the p assword to reality why does it say there is no password

     ah, i'm glad you asked that. the answer is because there is no password

4.30.18  3:50 pm   What's your opinion of the sun

     it is kind of a big deal

4.30.18  2:26 pm   Would you consider your music "serious"?

     yes, and more

4.30.18  2:25 pm   Why do you put weird twists in you songs like the ending of la de da de da de da de day oh?

     it's fun to end with a twist. it is also sometimes fun to begin with a twist, or maybe even twist for the entire time

4.30.18  2:11 pm   If letters can be uppercase or lowercase, why can't numbers be like that?

     they can

4.30.18  12:49 pm   how do i teleport my cat

     why can't you just accept where your cat is

4.30.18  12:49 pm   is there a reason to hate you

     perhaps if whomever you normally hate is not available for whatever reason

4.30.18  12:22 pm   do you like russian roulette

     i can barely tell it apart from other types of roulette

4.30.18  12:20 pm   If a man gets out of the shower and another man goes in, is that gay? I mean you're basically standing where another man stood naked in the shower and that's gay

     well i guess you got that squared away

4.30.18  11:58 am   do you like ducks or cactus's more, asking for my self.

     ? then you have to answer

4.30.18  11:08 am   Can you use a capital letter in your reply

     that doesn't seem necessary for this particular question

4.30.18  11:02 am   What do you think about dogs?

     they are like cats but different

4.30.18  10:50 am   Should i become a DJ?

     perhaps you already are

4.30.18  10:42 am   what should I do whenst the day doesn't seem to  go on?

     there will hardly be time to do anything before you notice that it does and still has been

4.30.18  10:12 am   are you allergic to capital letters?

     no, are you

4.30.18  9:46 am   what words other than love are four letters and can be used in various ways that are mostly positive

     like, help

4.30.18  8:59 am   do you believe treeism is a valid religion?

     i would have to check with the Committee of Religious Validation. i should pop down there anyway just to say hi, it's been a while

4.30.18  8:44 am   you have considered stars now i need ylur thoughts on ducks 

     seems like a cool idea

4.30.18  8:16 am   Have you considered making music videos for older songs that lack one, e.g. we could just get high

     yes, i have done that for many songs. movie star, new canaan, tuesday, and more

4.30.18  8:11 am   but really, if we think about it, why does anyone is gay?

     for love

     I very do want to need know.
